name: Time Flies (Dsiire, jakob02, Oofnerve, WretchedWeaponry, Partybulle, Jut, Burnedbun, Mathias_Henningsson, lakevince)
name_original: Time Flies (Dsiire, jakob02, Oofnerve, WretchedWeaponry, Partybulle, Jut, Burnedbun, Mathias_Henningsson, lakevince)
description:
Time Flies is a fast-paced top-down action game where you play as Edvard, a former human who got kidnapped at a young age and, through years of mutation experiments by evil scientists, was turned into a human-sized fly. Now, with newfound strength and the ability to slow down time, he must punch his way through scientists and military personnel and confront the head scientist of the laboratory, Vera van der Enk, in order to finally escape this vile place. 

Download instructions

1. Download the zip file
2. Extract/Unpack the zip file wherever you want
3. Run the Time-Flies.exe
4. Enjoy~
